title: Trying to create a ›has-prime-image‹ relationship with invalid CAR MODEL VARIANT ID
gherkin:
Given "CAR MODEL VARIANT" "BMW M3" does NOT exist
And there exists a "IMAGE" "M3 front-left"
When the user creates a "has prime image" relationship between "BMW M3" and "M3 front-left"
Then the request should be rejected with status code 404
